alert.note: Alert for Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 1:16PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila County through 200 PM MST... At 116 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cutter, or near Globe, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Globe, Cutter, Central Heights-Midland City and Claypool. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 248 and 269. AZ Route 70 between mile markers 253 and 262. AZ Route 77 between mile markers 164 and 170. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County
